description: The Container Application specification is a project to describe 'an Application' that is composed of a set of dependent Container Applications (containerapp). The Container Application specification defines a set of files required to describe such a containerapp. These files can then be used by other tools to deploy a containerapp. Developers may use other tools to generate most of the required containerapp files. Additional utilities can also take advantage of the resulting files, such as testing tools.
format: The files describing a containerapp in accordance with the Container Application Specification are represented using YAML 1.2 or JSON.

elements.name: Atomicfile
elements.description: Application template. This is the root object for the specification.

id.description: The machine readable id of the Container Application.

specversion.description: The semantic version string of the Container Application Specification used to describe the app. The value MUST be '0.0.1-alpha'.

metadata.description: An object holding optional metadata related to the Container Application, this may include license information or human readable information.

name.description: A human readable name of the containerapp.

appversion.description: The semantic version string of the Container Application.

description.description: A human readable description of the Container Application. This may contain information for the deployer of the containerapp.

name.description: The human readable license name used for the Container Application, no format imposed.

url.description: A URL to the license used for the API. MUST be in the format of a URL.

graph.description: A list of depending containerapps. Strings may either match a local sub directory or another containerapp-spec compliant containerapp image that can be pulled via a provider.

source.description: Source location of the Container Application, the source MUST be specified by a valid URL. If source is present, all other fields SHALL be ignored.

params.description: A list of ParamsObject that contain provider specific information. If params is present, source field SHALL be ignored.

description.description: A human readable description of the parameter.

constraints.description: An optional definition of constraints to the parameter.

description.description: A human readable description of the parameter.

default.description: An optional default value for the parameter.

artifacts.description: A list of ArtifactsObject that contain providr specific information. If artifacts is present, source field SHALL be ignored.

requirements.description: A list of requirements of this containerapp.

elements.name: README
elements.description: information for deploying this application targetted towards deployment ops sysadmin

elements.name: Dockerfile
elements.description: standard packaging for this application metadata

elements.name: provider
elements.description: directories of applications referenced in Atomicfile

contents.name: application
contents.description: a file referenced in the Atomicfile via file://<path/to/file> URI
